short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep GTM debug pane down while on preview mode as your preference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're like me, sometimes I need to preview Google Tag Manager (GTM) changes without the debug pane being visible. Hopefully this will help you like it helped me...
